values:
Will:  you know i'm a bottom.
Me:  be a power bottom
Will:  can i do that thing that weightlifters do where they try to left too much and their colon's pop out? but like pop out enough that i could also get it erect and put my excreted colon into your butthole?

Will:  fuck. sorry. i'm channeling william burroughs or something.

It's been goin' on for a while now... I must say I'm really quite good at it, too.  "It" being the fine art of providing devoted and loyal support and love to those who need it: the romantically crushed, the socially alienated, or the chronically depressed.
I have no problem with doing this, and I don't really expect much in return.  HOWEVER, I do expect one thing.  I expect that once I'm no longer absolutely needed, that I am not to be thrown away like a pair of crutches that have out-lived their utility.  My affections are sincere and my concern is genuine; it kills me to be completely shit on after really fostering a bond with someone.  I can't take being ignored after you get with that special someone, or being slowly excluded after I introduce you to my own closest friends, or being patronized after you're no longer depressed.  I'm done with it.  Completely.
So next time you need a shoulder on which you can cry, a friend on whom you can call, or a warm body with which you can share a bed, CALL SOMEBODY ELSE.  I'll have nothing to do with it.  That ship has sailed.
Thank you.  Goodnight.  And as always, go fuck yourself.
Cause I sure get tired of being wrong.
I just wish it was August (again/already).

...

I'm just sick of watching people for whom I have some semblance of respect make complete asses of themselves.  I'm sick of having my free time (what tiny amount of it there is, at least) wasted at parties populated with morons.  Maybe this kind of shit works for some of you, but it doesn't for me.  It kind of makes me sick to my stomach...

So, when I look detached: 
No, I'm not upset.
No, I'm not being weird.
No, I'm not "down-trodden"

I just want nothing to do with the people around me.  
Well, maybe that's too strong...  I want nothing to do with the games people play nor the transparent acts they put up nor the spineless interactions, etc.

Fuck, I guess an abundance of regrets has aged me beyond my years, and I'm subsequently bitter, judgmental and crotchety....  Either that or YOU ARE ALL ACTING LIKE IDIOTS AND IT MAKES ME FUCKING ASHAMED TO KNOW YOU.
Unfortunately, it needs to be said.

Eat my shit and die.
<3
I drink to much.  I think to much.  Sometimes I wish moments would never end.  Then, after that, I usually wish I was dead.
Serious words are in order, really.  Don't want the shit to hit the fan in an uncontrolled environment...

If there is one thing with which I don't want to deal, it's more anxiety attacks.
Last night, my brain turned to mush- a consequence of my complete inability to control my emotions and to accept facts while I am drunk.  
On the other hand, all of this would be a non-issue if people were just upfront.  (Myself especially)

So, in conclusion, we all eat shit, but sleep cures all.
Matt Joyner stank up my house.  Now I'm too unmotivated to put on a clothes.  What the fuck.
...But I'm sick of my NMR not matching up with my physical data.  Fuck that.
Half asleep, half awake.  Perpetual state.  Strange dreams of strange girls.  Where the fuck is my Los Violadores record?!?!?!

Yeah it's weird how things workout sometimes.  Back in school.  Life's back on track.  Suddenly everyone who would have derailed my life, with whom I've made an effort to severe ties over the past year come screaming out of the woodwork.  Ah well.  Make due, right?  Wish there was an easier way around all this.  No worries.  It will pass.  Fuck 'em.

Not sure why I'm doing this...  The whole concept seems stupid to me...  But its late, and in a search for an old friend (or maybe she was an enemy), I found something...  Something like this, but it was a secret message service between us...  Ah well.  That's lost and gone.  And I'm being melodramatic.  So either way, fuck it..  I'm tired...  Another time.
